get.summary: Get list of operations supported in the API.
get.description: Get a list of REST API supported by Microsoft.Migrate provider.

get.summary: Method to get a migrate project.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Azure Subscription Id in which migrate project was created.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group that migrate project is part of.

parameters.name: migrateProjectName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Migrate project.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.
